member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.NavigationItem
member.summary: Represents a navigation menu item.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.NavigationItem.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this navigation item (auto-generated from Href if not set).

member.summary: Display text for the navigation item.

member.summary: The route/URL for this navigation item (will be prefixed with plugin ID automatically).

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.NavigationItem.Icon
member.summary: Optional icon name (Lucide icon or custom class).

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.NavigationItem.Order
member.summary: Sort order for navigation items (lower = higher in menu).

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.NavigationItem.WithId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a custom ID for this navigation item.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.NavigationItem.WithPluginPrefix(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a copy of this navigation item with the href prefixed by the plugin ID. Used internally by the plugin manager to ensure unique routes.
member.param: The plugin ID to use as prefix.
member.returns: A new NavigationItem with the prefixed href.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginNavigationGroup.Items

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginRouteInfo.NavigationGroups
member.summary: Navigation items grouped by plugin.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginRouteInfo.NavigationItems

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator
member.summary: Static service locator for plugin services. Plugins register their service providers here so Blazor pages can resolve services even after hot-reload (where the host DI container has stale type references).

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.RegisterPlugin(System.String,System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Registers a plugin's service provider.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.UnregisterPlugin(System.String)
member.summary: Unregisters a plugin's service provider.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.GetService``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a service from a specific plugin's service provider.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.GetRequiredService``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a required service from a specific plugin's service provider. Throws if the service is not found.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.IsPluginRegistered(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a plugin is registered.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.GetRegisteredPluginIds
member.summary: Gets all registered plugin IDs.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.TryGetService``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to get a service from a specific plugin's service provider.
member.param: The retrieved service, or null if not found.
member.returns: True if the service was found, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.GetServiceFromAny``1
member.summary: Gets a service from any registered plugin that provides it. Searches all plugins until the service is found.
member.returns: The service instance, or null if not found in any plugin.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginServiceLocator.GetServicesFromAll``1
member.summary: Gets all instances of a service type from all registered plugins.
member.returns: Collection of services from all plugins that provide it.

member.name: F:MultiShock.PluginSdk.Flow.FlowNodeCategory.Logic
member.summary: Conditional and boolean logic nodes.

member.summary: Mathematical operation nodes.

member.summary: String manipulation nodes.

member.summary: Array manipulation nodes.

member.summary: Variable get/set nodes.

member.summary: Whether execution should stop after this node.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.Flow.IDynamicPortNode
member.summary: Interface for nodes that have dynamic input/output ports based on configuration. When a node implements this interface, the UI will call these methods to get the actual ports to display instead of using the static InputPorts/OutputPorts.

member.summary: Gets the input ports for a specific instance based on its configuration.
member.returns: The input ports for this configuration.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.Flow.IDynamicPortNode.GetOutputPorts(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Gets the output ports for a specific instance based on its configuration.
member.returns: The output ports for this configuration.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.Flow.IDynamicPropertyNode
member.summary: Interface for nodes that have dynamic properties with options that need to be resolved at runtime. When a node implements this interface, the UI will call this method to get the actual property options to display instead of using the static Properties options.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.Flow.IDynamicPropertyNode.GetProperties(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Gets the properties for this node with dynamically resolved options.
member.param: Current configuration values for this node instance.
Service provider to access runtime services like IDeviceActions.
member.returns: The properties dictionary with resolved options.

member.summary: Interface for nodes that process data within a flow. Process nodes receive inputs, perform operations, and produce outputs.

member.summary: Executes the node's logic.
member.param: The node instance with config and state.
Execution context with inputs, variables, and services.
member.returns: Result containing outputs and which flow ports to activate.

member.summary: Interface for nodes that can start flow execution. Trigger nodes listen for events and fire when conditions are met.

member.summary: Called when the flow is activated to start listening for triggers.
member.param: Service provider for accessing app services.

member.summary: Called when the flow is deactivated to stop listening.

member.name: E:MultiShock.PluginSdk.Flow.IFlowTriggerNode.Triggered
member.summary: Event raised when the trigger fires. The handler receives the instance and initial output values.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IConfigurablePlugin
member.summary: Optional interface for plugins that want to provide custom configuration UI.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions
member.summary: Minimal, stable action surface for plugins to interact with shockers without referencing app internals.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.LoadedShockersCount
member.summary: Total number of shockers currently loaded by the app.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.ConnectedSerialDeviceCount
member.summary: Number of serial devices currently connected.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.IsShockerLoaded(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if a specific shocker is loaded for a given device.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.GetLoadedShockers
member.summary: Returns a snapshot of currently loaded shockers with identifiers and names.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.GetLoadedShockersGroupedByDevice
member.summary: Returns loaded shockers grouped by their parent device ID.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.GetConnectedSerialDevices
member.summary: Returns information about all currently connected serial devices.

member.summary: Gets detailed information about a specific serial device by its client ID.

member.returns: Device info if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.GetAllSerialPorts
member.summary: Gets all available serial ports on the system, including those not currently connected.
member.returns: List of serial port names (e.g., "COM3", "COM4").

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.DisconnectSerialDevice(System.Int32)
member.summary: Disconnects a serial device by its client ID, allowing the port to be used for other purposes.
member.param: The client ID of the device to disconnect.
member.returns: True if the device was disconnected, false if not found.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.DisconnectSerialPort(System.String)
member.summary: Disconnects a serial device by port name, allowing the port to be used for other purposes.
member.returns: True if the device was disconnected, false if not found.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.ReconnectSerialPort(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to reconnect to a serial port that was previously disconnected.
member.param: The serial port name to reconnect.
member.returns: True if reconnection was initiated successfully.

member.name: E:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.SerialDeviceConnected
member.summary: Raised when a serial device connects. The int parameter is the client ID.

member.name: E:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.SerialDeviceDisconnected
member.summary: Raised when a serial device disconnects. The int parameter is the client ID.

member.name: E:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.SerialDataReceived
member.summary: Raised when data is received from a serial device.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.GetRecentSerialLogs(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets recent serial log entries (up to a configured limit).
member.param: Maximum number of entries to return. Default is 100.
member.returns: Recent serial log entries, newest first.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.GetSerialLogsForDevice(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets serial log entries for a specific device.
member.param: The client ID of the serial device.
Maximum number of entries to return. Default is 100.
member.returns: Serial log entries for the specified device, newest first.

member.summary: Perform an action against one or more shockers.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.SendSerialCommand(System.Int32,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sends a custom serial command to a device.
member.param: The client ID of the target device.
Optional value object that will be serialized as JSON.
member.returns: True if the command was sent successfully, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.SendSerialCommandByPort(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sends a custom serial command to a device by port name.
member.param: Optional value object that will be serialized as JSON.
member.returns: True if the command was sent successfully, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IDeviceActions.AddSerialLog(System.String,System.String,System.String,MultiShock.PluginSdk.SerialDataDirection)
member.summary: Adds a log entry to the serial logs for a specific port. Useful for plugins to log tool output (e.g., esptool) alongside device communication.
member.param: The serial port name this log is associated with.
Direction of the log entry (Sent or Received). Default is Received.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ShockerInfo

member.summary: Optional URL to the plugin's source code, documentation, or download page. Used when exporting flows to help users find required plugins.

member.summary: Gets the application's service provider.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.CreateLogger(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a logger for the plugin. Logs will be written to the plugin log file if separate plugin logs are enabled.
member.param: The category name for the logger (typically the plugin name or class name).
member.returns: A logger instance that writes to the application's logging system.

member.summary: Shows a notification/toast message.

member.summary: Shows a success toast notification.
member.param: If true, toast won't auto-dismiss (defaults to false).

member.summary: Shows a warning toast notification.

member.summary: Shows an info toast notification.

member.summary: Shows an error toast notification.
member.param: Optional duration in milliseconds (defaults to 8000ms for errors).
If true, toast won't auto-dismiss (defaults to false).

member.summary: Gets application settings or configuration.

member.summary: Sets application settings or configuration.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.AppDataPath
member.summary: Gets the application's data directory path. Plugins can store firmware files and other data here.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.GetPluginDataPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the plugin's dedicated data directory path. Each plugin gets its own isolated directory for storing data.
member.returns: Path to the plugin's data directory.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.PickFileAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Opens a file picker dialog and returns the selected file path.
member.param: The title for the file picker dialog.
Optional list of allowed file extensions (e.g., ".bin", ".hex").
member.returns: The selected file path, or null if cancelled.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.GetPlugin(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a loaded plugin by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the plugin.
member.returns: The plugin instance, or null if not found or not loaded.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.GetPlugin``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a loaded plugin by its ID, cast to a specific type. Useful when you know the concrete plugin type or an interface it implements.
member.typeparam: The type to cast the plugin to.
member.param: The unique identifier of the plugin.
member.returns: The plugin instance cast to T, or null if not found or wrong type.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.GetLoadedPlugins
member.summary: Gets all currently loaded plugins.
member.returns: A read-only collection of all loaded plugin instances.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.IsPluginLoaded(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a plugin with the specified ID is currently loaded.
member.param: The unique identifier of the plugin.
member.returns: True if the plugin is loaded, false otherwise.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.GetPluginService``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a service from a specific plugin's service container. This allows plugins to expose and consume services from each other.
member.param: The ID of the plugin that provides the service.
member.returns: The service instance, or null if not found.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.GetRequiredPluginService``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a required service from a specific plugin's service container. Throws if the plugin or service is not found.
member.param: The ID of the plugin that provides the service.
member.returns: The service instance.
member.exception: Thrown if plugin or service not found.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginHost.GetLoadedPluginIds
member.summary: Gets all plugin IDs that are currently loaded.
member.returns: A collection of loaded plugin IDs.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginRouteProvider
member.summary: Optional interface for plugins that want to provide navigation items. Implement this to contribute items to the app navigation.
member.remarks: Routes returned from will be automatically prefixed with /plugins/{plugin-id}/ to prevent route conflicts between plugins. For example, if your plugin ID is "my.plugin" and you return a route "/settings", the actual route will be "/plugins/my-plugin/settings". Make sure your Razor page @page directives match the prefixed route format.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginRouteProvider.GetNavigationItems
member.summary: Returns the navigation items for this plugin. Routes will be automatically prefixed with the plugin's ID.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginWithDependencies
member.summary: Optional interface for plugins that declare dependencies on other plugins. The plugin manager will validate that required plugins are loaded before initializing this plugin, and will ensure proper initialization order.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginWithDependencies.RequiredPlugins
member.summary: Gets the IDs of plugins that must be loaded for this plugin to function. If any required plugin is not available, this plugin will fail to initialize.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginWithDependencies.OptionalPlugins
member.summary: Gets the IDs of plugins that this plugin can optionally integrate with. The plugin will still initialize if these are not available, but may have reduced functionality.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginDependencyResult
member.summary: Result of a dependency check for a plugin.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginDependencyResult.IsValid
member.summary: Whether all required dependencies are satisfied.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginDependencyResult.MissingRequired
member.summary: List of missing required plugin IDs.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginDependencyResult.MissingOptional
member.summary: List of missing optional plugin IDs.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginDependencyResult.AvailableOptional
member.summary: List of available optional plugin IDs.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.PluginDependencyResult.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error message if dependencies are not satisfied.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IPluginWithStyles
member.summary: Optional interface for plugins that want to provide their own CSS.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IReloadablePlugin
member.summary: Extended plugin interface for plugins that support hot-reloading. Reloadable plugins manage their own service container to avoid DI issues.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IReloadablePlugin.PluginServices
member.summary: Gets the plugin's internal service provider. This is used to resolve plugin-specific services that need to survive hot-reload.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.IReloadablePlugin.OnUnloading
member.summary: Called when the plugin is about to be unloaded. Use this to clean up resources, cancel background tasks, etc.

member.name: T:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ReloadablePluginBase
member.summary: Base class for plugins that support hot-reloading. Manages an internal service container for plugin-specific services.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ReloadablePluginBase.PluginServices
member.summary: Gets the plugin's internal service provider.

member.name: P:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ReloadablePluginBase.HostServices
member.summary: Gets the host application's service provider.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ReloadablePluginBase.ConfigurePluginServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Override to register plugin-specific services. These services are managed by the plugin and survive hot-reload.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ReloadablePluginBase.OnInitialized
member.summary: Override to perform initialization after services are ready.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ReloadablePluginBase.GetNavigationItems
member.summary: Override to provide navigation items.

member.name: M:MultiShock.PluginSdk.ReloadablePluginBase.OnUnloading
member.summary: Called when the plugin is about to be unloaded. Override to clean up resources.
